GlobalMessageListener - Class in gruppe.irc.messageListeners
A very crude message listener, it takes all messages it receives and prints out the prefix, actuall command and message to standard output in a tabulator separated format.
GlobalMessageListener() - Constructor for class gruppe.irc.messageListeners.GlobalMessageListener
 
gruppe.irc.messageListeners - package gruppe.irc.messageListeners
This package contains the MessageListener interface that needs to be implemented by any listeners that is to be connected to the IRCConnection object.
